GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.15.68
GSD.description:
nvmet: fix a use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit ebf46da50beb78066674354ad650606a467e33fa, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit a07b4970f464f13640e28e16dad6cfa33647cc99. For more details please see the references link.
